ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": ""
};
var requestBody = `{}`;
var option = {
    "method": "POST",
    "body": String(requestBody),
    "headers": ""
};
var Url1 = Get('url') + '/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ListRank?device=pc&platform=web,' + JSON.stringify(option);
var Url2 = Get('url') + '/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/AllLabel?device=pc&platform=web,' + JSON.stringify(option);
rank = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url1)).data.list;
kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url2)).data.styles;
var exploreUrl = [];
if(cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('SESSDATA')) {
    var list = JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://api.bilibili.com/x/web-interface/nav')).data;
    if (cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('SESSDATA') && !list.uname) {
    	Login();
    	list = JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://api.bilibili.com/x/web-interface/nav')).data;
    }
    if(list.uname) {
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), list.uname);
        Option9 = `{{get('option9','0')}}`;
        Option10 = `{{get('option10','0')}}`;
        Option11 = `{{get('option11','0')}}`;
        Option12 = `{{get('option12','0')}}`;
        Option13 = `{{get('option13','0')}}`;
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + list.uname + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("bili-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('已购漫画', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/user.v1.User/GetAutoBuyComics?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option10}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('阅读历史', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/bookshelf.v1.Bookshelf/ListHistory?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option10}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣  追　漫  ✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('追漫顺序', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/bookshelf.v1.Bookshelf/ListFavorite?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option11}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('更新时间', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/bookshelf.v1.Bookshelf/ListFavorite?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option12}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('完成等免', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/bookshelf.v1.Bookshelf/ListFavorite?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option13}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Option = `{{get('option','0')}}`;
Option1 = `{{get('option1','0')}}`;
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/GetRankInfo?device=pc&platform=web,${Option}${rank[i].id}${Option1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i].name, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Option2 = `{{get('option2','0')}}`;
Option3 = `{{get('option3','0')}}`;
Option4 = `{{get('option4','0')}}`;
Option5 = `{{get('option5','0')}}`;
Option6 = `{{get('option6','0')}}`;
Option7 = `{{get('option7','0')}}`;
Option8 = `{{get('option8','0')}}`;
O = `{{get('o1',Get('o'))}}`;
P = `{{get('p1',Get('p'))}}`;
Q = `{{get('q1',Get('q'))}}`;
R = `{{get('r1',Get('r'))}}`;
url0 = `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ClassPage?device=pc&platform=web,${Option2}-1${Option3}${O}${Option4}${P}${Option5}${R}${Option6}{{page}}${Option7}${Q}${Option8}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('全部', url0, 1, 0.25, false));
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ClassPage?device=pc&platform=web,${Option2}${kind[j].id}${Option3}${O}${Option4}${P}${Option5}${R}${Option6}{{page}}${Option7}${Q}${Option8}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j].name, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = ((kind.length + 1) % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - ((kind.length + 1) % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false));
}
//exploreUrl.splice(40, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/127.0.0.0",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) || cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) == '') {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        //exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
T = `{{Get('t')}}`;
U = `{{Get('u')}}`;
url1 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=0&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('人气', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=1&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('吐槽', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=2&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('订阅', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/filter/classify';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url)).data.classifyList[0].list;
R = `{{Get('r')+1}}`;
Cate = `{{get('cate',Get('o'))}}`;
Status = `{{get('status',Get('p'))}}`;
Zone = `{{get('zone',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/filter/list?theme=${kind[i].tagId}&cate=${Cate}&status=${Status}&zone=${Zone}&sortType=${R}&page={{page}}&size=20`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].tagName, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
Headers.Authorization = ('Bearer ' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token"))) || '';
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    if (baseUrl.includes('/sub/')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.subList;
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[中已]/g, '');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name;
            var url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option);
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': cache.get(java.md5Encode16(url + "Author")),
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': url
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.subList[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else if (baseUrl.includes('/rank/')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data;
        var D = ['日','周','月','总'];
        var K = ['人气:','吐槽:','订阅:'];
        var index = parseInt(baseUrl.replace(/.*by_time=(\d).*/, '$1'));
        var index1 = parseInt(baseUrl.replace(/.*rank_type=(\d).*/, '$1'));
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = (list[i].status || '').replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest + '〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/detail/' + list[i].comic_id + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option)
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.comicList;
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name + (list[i].last_updatetime > 0 ? ('〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕') : '');
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option)
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.comicList) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token"))).length !== 0 && ImageLimit() !== 'undefined') {
        let L = Login_1();
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n圖片讀取/上限：' + L[1] + '/' + L[0] + '\n┋┋' + '\n重置时间：' + secondsToHours(L[2]) + '後重置' + '\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        ImageLimit();
        var limit = json.usage + '/' + json.limit;
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore(limit, '', 1, 0.25, false));

}

eval(String(source.loginUrl));

    '全部漫画',
    '最新上架'
];
orderby = [
    '/classify',
    '/list/new'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}?page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.45, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','恋爱','纯爱','古风','异能','悬疑','剧情','科幻',
    '奇幻','玄幻','穿越','冒险','推理','武侠','格斗','战争',
    '热血','搞笑','大女主','都市','总裁','后宫','日常','韩漫',
    '少年','其他'
];
type = [
    'type=all','type=lianai','type=chunai','type=gufeng','type=yineng','type=xuanyi','type=juqing','type=kehuan',
    'type=qihuan','type=xuanhuan','type=chuanyue','type=mouxian','type=tuili','type=wuxia','type=gedou','type=zhanzheng',
    'type=rexie','type=gaoxiao','type=danuzhu','type=dushi','type=zongcai','type=hougong','type=richang','type=hanman',
    'type=shaonian','type=qita'
];
Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
Filter = `{{get('filter',Get('p'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/classify?${type[j]}${Region}${State}${Filter}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(30, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}

    '更新',

    '收藏'
];

    '&orderby=click',
    '&orderby=date',
    '&orderby=score',
    '&orderby=shoucang'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${orderby[i]}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';

];

    '','rexue','jizhan','yundong','tuili','maoxian','gaoxiao','zhanzhen',
    'shenmo','renzhe','jingji','xuanyi','shehui','lianai','chongwu','xixue',
    'luoli','hougong','yujie','bazong','xuanhuan','gufeng','lishi','mangai',
    'youxi','chuanyue','kongbu','zhenren','kehuan','dushi','wuxia','xiuzhen',
    'shenghuo','dongzuo'
];

for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${link[j]}${OrderBy}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}

var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '年度',
    '本月',
    '本周',
    '今日',
    '上升',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','冒险','科幻','霸总','玄幻','校园','修真',
    '搞笑','穿越','后宫','耽美','恋爱','悬疑','恐怖','战争',
    '动作','同人','竞技','励志','架空','灵异','百合','古风',
    '生活','真人','都市','其他','日常','其它','纯爱','推理',
    '奇幻','格斗','大女主','剧情','总裁','武侠','异能','少年',
    '韩漫'
];
link = [
    '','/tags/6','/tags/7','/tags/8','/tags/9','/tags/10','/tags/11','/tags/12',
    '/tags/13','/tags/14','/tags/15','/tags/16','/tags/17','/tags/18','/tags/19','/tags/20',
    '/tags/21','/tags/22','/tags/23','/tags/24','/tags/25','/tags/26','/tags/27','/tags/28',
    '/tags/29','/tags/30','/tags/31','/tags/48','/tags/49','/tags/50','/tags/51','/tags/52',
    '/tags/53','/tags/54','/tags/55','/tags/56','/tags/57','/tags/58','/tags/59','/tags/60',
    '/tags/61'
];
Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/category/list/${O}/finish/${Q}/order/${Order}${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(50, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
title = [
    '排行',
    '更新'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
orderby = [
    '/rank/',
    '/update/{{page}}/'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.4, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url') + '/search/';
var list = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Url)).select('.filter-item.clearfix')[2].select('li');
OO = `{{get('oo',Get('o'))}}`;
PP = `{{get('pp',Get('p'))}}`;
QQ = `{{get('qq',Get('q'))}}`;
RR = `{{get('rr',Get('r'))}}`;
SS = `{{get('ss',Get('s'))}}`;
for (i in list) {
    var kind = i;
    var kind1 = String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/\/list\//, '-').replace(/\/$/, '').replace(/^\-$/, '');
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/list/${OO}${PP}${kind1}${SS}${QQ}${RR}{{page}}/`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(list[i].text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
link = [
    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
Area = `{{get('area',Get('o'))}}`;
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?cate=${link[j]}&area=${Area}&end=${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '精品榜',
    '人气榜',
    '推荐榜',
    '黑马榜',
    '更新榜',
    '新漫画'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/rank/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
sort = [
    '冒险','热血','都市','玄幻','悬疑','耽美','恋爱','生活',
    '搞笑','穿越','修真','后宫','女主','古风','连载','完结'
];
for (i in sort) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/sort/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(sort[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (sort.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (sort.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '最近更新',
    '新书发布',
    '推荐漫画'
];
orderby = [
    '/ranking/all',
    '/ranking/monthly',
    '/ranking/weekly',
    '/ranking/daily',
    '/update',
    '/update/newbook',
    '/update/recommend'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版','肉欲','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之妇','女大生','狗血剧','同居','好友','调教','动作','后宫',
    '不伦','3D','校园','耽美','日漫'
];
link = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版漫画','肉慾','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之婦','女大生','狗血劇','同居','好友','調教','动作','後宮',
    '不倫','3D','校園','耽美','日漫'
];
Ob = `{{get('ob',Get('p'))}}`;
St = `{{get('st',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/comics/${link[j]}/ob/${Ob}/st/${St}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '排行榜',
    '连载中',
    '已完结'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
url = [
    '`${host}/top.html`',
    '`${host}/weekly/?page={{page}}`',
    '`${host}/complete/?page={{page}}`'
];
for (i in title) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], eval(url[i]), 1, -1, false));
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
function explore(a, b, c, d, e) {
  style = "{title: \"" + a + "\",url: \"" + b + "\",style: {layout_flexGrow:" + c + ",layout_flexBasisPercent:" + d + ",layout_wrapBefore: " + e + "}}";
  return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = ["本日排行", "本周排行", "本月排行"];
type = ["tt=H24&ct=VC", "tt=D7&ct=VC", "tt=D30&ct=VC"];
for (i in title) {
  var pathname = "comics/leaderboard?" + type[i];
  var method = "GET";
  var signature = getsignature(pathname, setTime, method);
  var headers = getheaders(setTime, nonce, signature).replace(/\"/g, '\\\"');
  var url = "https://api.manhuapica.com/" + pathname + ",{\\\"method\\\":\\\"GET\\\",\\\"headers\\\":{" + headers + "}}";
  exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 0x1, 0.25, ![]));
}
exploreUrl.splice(0x0, 0x0, explore("༺ˇ»`ʚ 　  ✨排行榜✨  　 ɞ´«ˇ༻", '', 0x1, 0x1, ![]));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.slice(0, 4).join(',') + ']';
exploreUrlStr;</js>

eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
(function searchComicList(searchKeys) {
    var pathname = "comics/advanced-search?page=" + page + "&s=dd";
    var method = "POST";
    var body = "\{\"keyword\":\"" + searchKeys + "\",\"sort\":\"dd\"\}";
    var signature = getsignature(pathname, setTime, method);
    var headers = getheaders(setTime, nonce, signature);
    end = "https://api.manhuapica.com/" + pathname + ",{\"method\":\"POST\",\"headers\":{" + headers + "},\"body\":'" + body + "'}";
    return end;
}(key));
</js>

bookSourceComment:
永久站：
https://fuhouse.club/bl
ps：
删注释者减寿秃头倒大霉
使用指南：
若当前无法使用该源，原因有二
一、ip不对需切换网络
二、网站改新网址了
第一种情况 只需切换WIFI/流量/梯子即可
第二种情况 需按以下步骤操作

ruleContent.content: function atob(data) { var base = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/="; var a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i = 0x0, j = 0x0, k = '', l = []; if (!data) { return data; } data += ''; do { d = base.indexOf(data.charAt(i++)); e = base.indexOf(data.charAt(i++)); f = base.indexOf(data.charAt(i++)); g = base.indexOf(data.charAt(i++)); h = (((d << 18) | (e << 12)) | (f << 6)) | g; a = (h >> 16) & 255; b = (h >> 8) & 255; c = h & 255; if (f == 64) { l[j++] = String['fromCharCode'](a); } else if (g == 64) { l[j++] = String['fromCharCode'](a, b); } else { l[j++] = String['fromCharCode'](a, b, c); } } while (i < data.length); k = l.join(''); return k; } try{ //解密方法由💖尐哖💖提供 eval(result.match(/(eval\([\s\S]+?)<\/script/)[1]); data = atob(__c0rst96); k = java.getString('.readerContainer@data-id'); key = ["c21raHkyNTg=","c21rZDk1ZnY=","bWQ0OTY5NTI=","Y2Rjc2R3cQ==","dmJmc2EyNTY=","Y2F3ZjE1MWM=","Y2Q1NmN2ZGE=","OGtpaG50OQ==","ZHNvMTV0bG8=","NWtvNnBsaHk="][k]; key = atob(key); //java.log(key); len = key.length; imgs = ''; for (i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { k = i % len; a = data.charCodeAt(i); b = key.charCodeAt(k); imgs += String.fromCharCode(a ^ b); } eval(atob(imgs)).map(a=> '').join("\n") }catch(e){java.log(e)}

bookSourceComment: 似乎要翻墙才能看到封面图 ☑️计算page(自书源帮助) {{(page-1)*18}}如(1-1)*18=0 ☑️js匹配链接,加工合成img（还要替换h**，不然图片模糊） 这个网站的图片有四个质量 h120 h600-e6 h1000-e7 s0-e7 想改图片质量自行更改js就行 id.invisblecontent@html list=result.match(/http[^']*webp/g) result="" for(n in list){ result+="\n" }

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".weui-panel__bd a"),
  $ = (key) => String(list[i].select(key).text()),
  data = [];
list == 0
  ? java.log("🎨绅士漫画💞：搜索失效，请修复")
  : ""
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  data.push({
    name: $(".weui-media-box__title"),
    author: "",
    kind: "",
    word: "",
    latest: "",
    intro: $(".weui-media-box__desc"),
    cover: list[i].select("img").attr("src"),
    url: list[i].attr("href")
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
$[*]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements("#chapters a"),
  data = [];
list == 0
  ? java.log("🎨绅士漫画💞：目录失效，请修复")
  : ""
date = String(java.getElements("#book-info .author").text()).replace(/更新：|\s.*/g, "");
for (i in list) {
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1
      ? `[${list.length}]·${list[i].text()}〔${date}〕`
      : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
$[*]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //月份 
    "d+": this.getDate(), //日 
    "H+": this.getHours(), //小时 
    "m+": this.getMinutes(), //分 
    "s+": this.getSeconds(), //秒 
    "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //季度 
    "S": this.getMilliseconds() //毫秒 
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".detail-list-1 li a"),
  data = [];
for (i in list) {
  data.push({
    title:
      i == list.length - 1 ? `${list[i].text()}〔${date}〕` : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
1 == flag
  ? (java.put("Enable", 1), JSON.stringify(data))
  : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>

永久站：
https://fuhouse.club/bl

ps：
删注释者减寿秃头倒大霉

使用指南：
若当前无法使用该源，原因有二
一、ip不对需切换网络
二、网站改新网址了

第一种情况 只需切换WIFI/流量/梯子即可
第二种情况 需按以下步骤操作
①复制永久站网址
②用浏览器打开该网址
③永久站网址会自动切换成可用网址
④复制当前可用网址
⑤将此源URL替换成复制的可用网址

注：
若两种情况都无法解决失效问题 
大概率网站改代码了 
随缘等人修复 主要看命

2022.7.10 酷安@乃星

aList=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).select('#chapter-list1 a')
list=[]
for(i in aList){list[i]={"title":String(aList[i].text()),"curl":aList[i].attr('href')}}
id=baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\//)[1]
url="http://m.mhxqiu3.com/bookchapter/"
body="id="+id+"&id2=1"
option={"method":"POST","body":String(body)}
data=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))
for(i in data){list.push({"title":data[i].chaptername,"curl":"/"+String(id)+"/"+data[i].chapterid+".html"})}
list

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
data = JSON.parse(result).data;
JSON.stringify({
	  "name": String(decode(data.Name)),
	  "author": String(decode(data.Author)),
	  "img": String(data.Img),
	  "desc": String(decode(data.Desc)),
	  "time": String(data.LastTime),
	  "new": String(data.LastChapter),
	  "kind": String(data.CName)+","+String(data.BookStatus),
	})
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.name

ruleContent.content: var DEBUG = 0 var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric ); with(javaImport){ function decode(str){ var desede = DESede("CBC","PKCS5Padding",String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),String("SK8bncVu").getBytes()); return desede.decryptStr(str) } }; function toImg(Str){return Str.map(str=>``).join("\n")} Array.prototype.toImg=function (){return toImg(this,arguments[0])} var arr = String(decode(JSON.parse(result).data.content.match(/}+(.*)/)[1])).replace(/[\[\]"]/g,"").split(","); DEBUG?arr.slice(0,1).toImg():arr.toImg()

ruleExplore.author: $.Author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
var list = [];
JSON.parse(result).data.BookList.forEach(str=>{
	list.push({
		"Name":decode(str.Name),
		"Author":decode(str.Author),
		"Img":str.Img,
		"CName":decode(str.CName)+","+str.Score+"分",
		"Desc":decode(str.Desc),
		"Id":str.Id
		})
	})
JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$.*

  	    result=java.ajax(java.get('surl'))
